title: The Heat Stay Alive in Game 5 of the NBA Finals with Bill Simmons | The Mismatch
description:
Verno and KOC go live after the Heat outlast the Lakers in Game 5 of the NBA Finals with special guest Bill Simmons. 

Hosts: Chris Vernon and Kevin O’Connor

Guest: Bill Simmons
